thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: Richard Stewart
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Richard Stewart

author: Richard Stewart
title: Richard Stewart
text:
The pick up at Melbourne's Tullamarine Airport was efficient and straightforward, and the pre-pay fuel option for top-up on return at AU$1.00/litre, was excellent. It meant that we could go straight to the Return bay to drop the car off and not have to worry about chasing around trying to find a service station to fill-up with expensive fuel.
Staff were helpful and friendly, especially Ben in the Return bay.
The car was a late model Kia and a pleasure to drive.
Thanks Redspot. We would recommend you without hesitation.
Richard Stewart
New Zealand
